archimate:Product.name: Graphileon
archimate:Product.documentation: Graphileon: a graph-driven dashboard development environment. It uses a graph database to store user-interface components (e.g. Networks, Tables, Forms) in nodes (“vertices”) and triggers in relations (“links” or “edges”) to define the interactions and data-flows between the UI components. You can download the Graphileon Personal Edition for free. at https://graphileon.com/
